headlines.headline: Fantasy basketball picks, DFS and betting tips for Sunday's NBA games
headlines.description: Jim McCormick breaks down Sunday's NBA games and offers his top fantasy streamers as well as his favorite bets and DFS plays.

headlines.headline: Michael Jordan and Kobe Bryant face off
headlines.description: On this date, the 1998 All Star Game signified the passing of the NBA torch from Michael Jordan to Kobe Bryant.

headlines.headline: Portland takes on Philadelphia in non-conference matchup
headlines.description: Philadelphia 76ers (30-22, sixth in the Eastern Conference) vs. Portland Trail Blazers (25-28, ninth in the Western Conference)

headlines.headline: Sacramento visits New Orleans on 13-game road skid
headlines.description: Sacramento Kings (12-42, 15th in the Western Conference) vs. New Orleans Pelicans (14-40, 14th in the Western Conference)

headlines.headline: Golden State faces Memphis, looks to end home losing streak
headlines.description: Memphis Grizzlies (20-31, 11th in the Western Conference) vs. Golden State Warriors (28-25, eighth in the Western Conference)

headlines.headline: Charlotte puts home win streak on the line against Detroit
headlines.description: Detroit Pistons (38-13, first in the Eastern Conference) vs. Charlotte Hornets (25-28, 10th in the Eastern Conference)

headlines.headline: Who are the current NFL team owners?
headlines.description: NFL team owners carry a variety of reputations in the public eye. Who is in charge of your favorite franchises? Check out this list for more details.

headlines.headline: Hispanic icons who owned Super Bowl halftime before Bad Bunny
headlines.description: From Bruno Mars to Gloria Estefan, a wide array of Hispanic superstars has graced the Super Bowl halftime stage. Reflect on top performances now.

headlines.headline: Who are the youngest NFL quarterbacks to start a Super Bowl?
headlines.description: At Super Bowl 2026, Drake Maye will become the second-youngest quarterback to start in a Super Bowl game. Check out who else is on the list now.

headlines.headline: Dolphins, Cardinals face challenges in Tua Tagovailoa, Kyler Murray trades
headlines.description: The Dolphins and Cardinals will have challenges trading their starting quarterbacks -- Tua Tagovailoa and Kyler Murray, respectively -- because of financial hurdles.

headlines.headline: Super Bowl 2026: Patriots-Seahawks live updates, highlights and analysis
headlines.description: Live updates, highlights, scene, insight from Super Bowl LX at Levi's Stadium.

headlines.headline: Puppy Bowl 2026 features Bad Bunny, Josh Allen-inspired pups
headlines.description: Before the Seahawks and Patriots clash in Super Bowl LX, Barker Playfield, Josh Howlin and more take the field for Puppy Bowl XXII, competing for the Lombarky Trophy and the title of "Most Pupular."

headlines.headline: Olympic hockey betting odds: Canada favored to win men's gold, USA favored to win women's
headlines.description: Who are the favorites and underdogs heading into the men's and women's 2026 Olympic ice hockey tournaments?

headlines.headline: What are the winningest regions in sports?
headlines.description: The Los Angeles Dodgers won back-to-back World Series titles in 2024 and 2025. Which areas and leagues in North America have the most sports titles?

headlines.headline: Czechia loses Bruins' Pavel Zacha for Olympics due to injury
headlines.description: Czechia has to do without Pavel Zacha at the Milan Cortina Games as the Boston Bruins center will not recover in time from injury for the Olympic hockey tournament in a blow for the Czechs.

headlines.headline: Felony charge against top NHL prospect Gavin McKenna dropped
headlines.description: Penn State hockey star Gavin McKenna will have his felony aggravated assault charge dropped, the Centre County District Attorney's Office announced Friday.

headlines.headline: NHL Power Rankings: Updated 1-32 poll heading into Olympic break
headlines.description: A special set of Power Rankings as players get ready to head to the Milan Cortina Olympics.

headlines.headline: Golden Knights dominate Kings 4-1 with early scoring blitz
